channel.title: Maps on Concho Resources
channel.description: Recent content in Maps on Concho Resources

item.title: Eastern Delaware Maps
item.description: Focus Mapped completions beginning in 2015. Includes three maps showing activity by year (2015, 2016 and 2017-2018). Animation shows trend moving eastward toward Central Basin Platform. Operators initially targeting Wolfcamp A in Southern Delaware. South of RSPP’s acreage, Mewbourne completed two Wolfcamp C/Ds in 2017. Lilis completed a single Wolfcamp B last year. Majority of Bone Spring activity concentrated in New Mexio. 2015 Activity 2016 Activity 2017-2018 Activity 2015-2018 Activity Over Time

item.title: Mapping Pad Development Activity
item.description: Data Sources and Methodology Data obtained from IHS and filtered to permit dates beginning in 2017. Well cluster counts will identify pads, sections and multi-section development dependent upon well density. 2nd map results were filtered by spud date to show activity starting in Q3’17. Map Identifies Developments From Permits, Spuds and Completions Beginning in 2017 {"
